mapper.select: select a.user_id userId, b.item_no itemNo, b.id itemId, b.item_name, b.approval_no_end_at effectiveDate , b.item_brand_id brandId, (select ibrand_name from t_item_brand where id=b.item_brand_id) brandName , a.item_price platformPrice, a.item_num itemNum , b.img_cover imgCover, c.order_status orderStatus, c.order_id orderId from t_order_info a ,t_item b ,t_order c where a.item_id =b.id and a.order_id=c.order_id and a.user_id=#{userId} and c.order_id=#{orderId}
